EndGameTimerDuration.Description: Duration of the end game scenario

EndGameReminderRate.Description: Rate (percent) at which the reminder sound will be played during the end game

OpenEscape_DechargeRate.Description: Rate at which the open charge is decreased if no survivor is opening the gate

EndGameTimerSlowDownPercentage.Description: percentage at which the count down timer will slow down if a survivor is downed/hooked

EndGameSacrificeCameraSnapToPositionTime.Description: Time it will take to the camera to pull back to its new position for the survivor to spectate his own wonderful sacrifice

EndGameSacrificeCameraZoomOut.Description: number of meters the camera will zoom out when the end game sacrifice starts
